idea:
A brand for anything related to cities offering trendy designs with a local flavour on its products. The idea is to provide people with a piece of memory for places they feel attached with.
Offering t-shirts for around 12 cities right now at www.citees.in and also selling on Amazon and Flipkart. We want to extend the product line to coasters, mugs, posters etc and in long term and go offline with a platform to promote anything that a city can be associated with.
name: CITEES

idea:
Talent Dekho is an interactive, multi lingual "video first"​ mobile platform which allows users to represent their hyper local communities by showcasing their talent across categories in a fun way.

The platform enables regional users with the right tools (including tech tools) to express their talent in the best possible way. It also helps create hyper local influencers across entertainment categories for people to be inspired by them. The platform pitches groups / users across categories against each other in a healthy competitive environment to bring out the best in them.
name: Superlative Talent Media Pvt Ltd

idea:
Sukdhi Global IT Solution Pvt ltd is an ITES firm, launched on April 2018, headquartered in Mumbai, India.
The name “Sukdhi” comes from two different cultures and languages – “Suk” in Korean means “Pure” and “Dhi” in Sanskrit means “Thought” or “Mind.”
Our Vision is to Empower People, Environment and the Nation as a whole with opportunities, which forms the tenets for happy living. We believe Connectivity, Information Sharing, Collaboration and Progressive Attitude are key aspects to develop a comprehensive environment of harmonious accomplishments, inclusive growth and sustained nation building.
We, as Sukdhi, are working on multiple concepts keeping the above vision close to our heart and in mind. These concepts / projects are in various phases of development.
To start with, we are launching the new web-portal, www.PhDhi.in in Jan 2019. Over the last two decades, the world has seen radical changes in science and technology with a steady rise in the number of doctoral graduates. India is steadily climbing its ranks globally on the availability for skilled workers and PhD professionals. Based on multiple initiatives like “Make In India,” increased impetus on Private-Public Partnerships and Government’s Mandate to make Ph.D degree mandatory across many sectors, we understand the need to develop a platform which can bridge this huge demand and supply anomaly.
PhDhi.in provides the platform to our scientific community to address their credentials and strengths in the most effective way connecting them to the real needs of industry, thereby creating an atmosphere of true collaboration, connection and knowledge sharing. We dream that our Scientist and their research are “HEARD.”
At the same time, Industry also need to cope up with the rapid changes in environment. Often the matrix of success lies on innovation and robust pipeline. With a more connected world, tremendous opportunities lie for both research scholars and industry.
All our projects are based on 2 principles – Demand Feasibility and Scalability.
Our concepts are developed to meet the Current Unmet Demands or preparing the population for a Future (probably unimagined) demand. With every passing year or decade, there is a change is our demand matrix as well – a change which is not only becoming faster, with shorter span but also more unpredictable. A whole new subject is emerging on the science of predicative analysis and proactive measures to create a Value System for future. Analysing Future Demand is the Key for Sustainable Growth. We ensure that our projects are future-oriented and aim to meet the possible demand calls of tomorrow.
Proudly now, India is reaping the benefits of Demographic Dividend. With world’s largest youngest working population, availability of huge skilled man-power, fast transformation of unorganised sectors to organised ones, we are standing on a sweet spot of opportunity and talent coexisting together. Sukdhi’s projects are designed keeping Scalability in mind. Each of our projects are having capabilities to be scalable to magnanimous proportions. Additionally, our projects are designed for easy replication across geographies.
We envision to create a beautiful world with ample opportunities and happiness for everyone.
Sukdhi or as the name implies “Pure Thought”, we are deeply touched by the teachings of Swami Vivekananda – “We are what our thoughts have made us; So take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts Live; They Travel Far.”


Main Objects: 1. To carry on the business of providing Information technology solutions and services related to Web-Technologies, Internet and E-commerce, including to design, develop, maintain, operate, own, establish, install, host, provide, create, facilitate, supply, sale, purchase, license or otherwise deal in Internet portals, Internet networks, Media Portals, Internet solutions, Internet gateways, Internet service providers, E-commerce, Web-site designing, Web based and Web enabled services and applications, E-commerce service provider, E-commerce solutions, E-commerce platforms, E-commerce education, E-commerce technologies and E-business solutions.
2. To provide consultancy services addressed to business process engineering, information technology and the design and implementation of information technology solutions for Industry and to establish computer network, either as part of international network or as stand alone network or otherwise, development of websites, Portal Sites and provide high speed digital / analog communication links to other networks and to establish and offer internet services, internet service provider and any other service which is feasible by using internet or any other such international networks. To carry on WEB portal business, IT server farms and hosting business, digital service provider business, IT software development business, multimedia software development business and any other business activity in the
name: SUKDHI GLOBAL IT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Bookmyparty is on the go mobile app service helping users to search & discover clubs/lounges/restaurants, book their favourite club & reserve table at their favourite restaurants/lounges. It has features of selection of Dj artist for clubs, music choice for lounges & cuisines for restaurants. 
Value addition features for are our USP in POS
name: bookmyparty

idea:
Vision Biosciences Pvt. Ltd. is a young and dynamic company. Vision Biosciences Pvt. Ltd. has its Registered Office in Pune, India.
Realizing the potential of healthcare and nutraceutical industry, Vision Biosciences has ventured into technology development and manufacturing activity associated with above industries.
Vision Biosciences is engaged in developing and manufacturing or transferring technologies for manufacturing innovative life sciences, biotech, food and nutraceutical related products to client companies.
name: VISION BIOSCIENCES
